overview:
Landon has 10 years of IT experience that includes software development and system administration.

He has worked with large consulting firms such as Accenture and Microsoft to deliver world class enterprise solutions. He is an architect at the Department of Revenue of several complex tax systems that serves the entire state of Georgia constituents. He is know for his leadership and technical expertise in the latest technology.

Prior to the Department of Revenue he was the lead developer at one of the larger credit card processors (RBSLink). There he developed systems for merchant boarding, merchant roll outs, and customer service portals to hundreds of thousands of customers, along with data mining and reporting on millions of credit card transactions
